turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, could you order me a drink from the Starbucks on 22nd and South in Philadelphia?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure no problem. What drink would you like.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a White Chocolate Mocha, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of creamer? They've got almond milk, coconut milk, nonfat, whole, 2%, or soy.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One last thing. Do you want whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes! That sounds awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I agree.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Are those all the options available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, this is all they offer for the White Chocolate Mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else you wanted.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it just the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I'll go ahead and place the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks a bunch.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll head over to the Starbucks now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sounds good. Your order has been placed and is being made now. You can pick it up at the Starbucks on 22nd and South in Philadelphia in a few minutes. You should be receiving your receipt through text now.
